events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me well. I would like to request a refund.
The customer's message mentions a refund request, so this case is categorized under Refund.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 4582719. The jacket is unused and still in the original packaging as you requested.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund once we receive the jacket back. A prepaid return label will be sent shortly.
That sounds good, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed. You should see the amount back in your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the refund appeared in my account today. Thank you for all the help throughout this process!
We’re glad everything was resolved to your satisfaction. Closing this case now, and don’t hesitate to contact us again.
